scripts.dev: npm run build -w packages/shared && concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.dev:api: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run dev -w apps/api
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run typecheck -w apps/api && npm run typecheck -w apps/web
